courses.title: Introduction to Guitar
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Start your piano journey with basic techniques, scales, and beginner songs.

courses.title: Music Theory 101
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including notation, scales, and chords.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your guitar skills with advanced techniques like fingerpicking and soloing.

courses.title: Jazz Piano Improvisation
courses.description: Learn to improvise and play jazz piano with confidence.

courses.title: Introduction to Singing
courses.description: Learn the basics of singing, including breath control, pitch, and tone.

courses.title: Drum Set Basics
courses.description: Start playing the drums with basic rhythms, techniques, and songs.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn to create electronic music with software like Ableton Live and FL Studio.

courses.title: Songwriting Techniques
courses.description: Discover techniques for writing lyrics and composing melodies.

courses.title: Classical Violin Mastery
courses.description: Master the violin with techniques and pieces from the classical repertoire.
